General.Name: NorCom Information Technology GmbH & Co. KGaA
General.Description: NorCom Information Technology GmbH & Co. KGaA develops and implements big data solutions in Germany and internationally. The company offers DaSense, an AI solution platform that combines artificial intelligence with data and document management. It serves the govtech, legal tech, and industry sector. NorCom Information Technology GmbH & Co. KGaA was founded in 1989 and is based in Munich, Germany.
